vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.2.40;
son of: Eleasah (H0501);
father of: Shallum (H7967I)
§ Sisamai = "water crane" or "swallow"
a descendant of Sheshan in the line of Jerahmeel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Jerahmeel; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
西斯買 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "鷺鷥" 或 "燕子"
刵拉篾一族示珊的後裔
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
西斯买 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "鹭鸶" 或 "燕子"
刵拉篾一族示珊的后裔
